meta.title: Ethereum Issuance Forum | EthCC 2026
meta.description: A dedicated event to discuss the responsible evolution of Ethereum issuance. Hosted at EthCC 2026 in Cannes, France.

hero.text: A dedicated event to discuss the responsible evolution of Ethereum issuance.

about.label: About the Event
about.heading: About the event
paragraphs: The Ethereum Issuance Forum is an invite-only event to increase transparency and build shared context surrounding Ethereum's issuance policy research.
Hosted by the Ethereum Foundation, the goal of the forum is to surface sector-specific considerations, trade-offs, and open questions, to inform the research process.

agenda.label: Agenda
agenda.heading:
An afternoon of
focused dialogue
agenda.intro: The event will span approximately four hours, including breaks for informal conversation and a closing happy hour.

items.title: Level-setting Presentations
items.description: Researchers will present current context and modeling. These talks will be recorded and published to ensure transparency for the wider community.

items.title: Moderated Roundtable
items.description: A discussion where all participants have the opportunity to speak and discuss issuance policy considerations. To encourage open dialogue, this portion of the event will not be recorded.

items.title: Networking
items.description: Informal time to connect with peers and researchers.

agenda.note: A detailed schedule will be released closer to the event date.

items.question: Do I need an EthCC ticket to attend?
items.answer: Yes. As the roundtable is hosted within the EthCC venue, a valid conference ticket is required for entry. At minimum an EthCC day ticket is required which can be bought here.

items.question: What is the goal of this roundtable?
items.answer: The primary goal is to build context and reduce uncertainty. We are here to explore and inform, not to vote or finalize a specific policy. The output of this event will be summaries of themes and considerations that help inform the broader research process.

items.question: How does registration work?
items.answer: This is an event with limited capacity (~85 attendees) to ensure productive discussion. The event is on an invitation basis. If you were not invited but would like to attend, please feel free to email issuance@ethereum.org.

items.question: Will the session be recorded?
items.answer: Yes and no. The introductory presentations will be recorded and shared publicly. The roundtable discussion itself will not be recorded to allow participants to speak freely.
